com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer
Interface ContentProvider<I>

All Known Subinterfaces:
StructuredContentProvider<I,E>, TreeContentProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultContentProvider, ModelContentProvider, ModelTreeContentProvider, RemoteContentProvider, RemoteModelContentProvider
public interface ContentProvider<I>

A content provider mediates between the viewer's model and the viewer itself.

Method Summary
 void inputChanged(Viewer viewer, I oldInput, I newInput)
          Notifies this content provider that the given viewer's input has been switched to a different element.
 

Method Detail

inputChanged

void inputChanged(Viewer viewer,
                  I oldInput,
                  I newInput)
Notifies this content provider that the given viewer's input has been switched to a different element.

Parameters:
viewer - the viewer
oldInput - the previous input or null if none
newInput - the new input
